title: Why "Bribing" Your Child With Treats... Doesn't Work. (And What Does.)
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Parents - Yesterday 
"Great job with your chores, Katie! Here's that cupcake that I promised you'd get for being so good." It seems innocent enough. After all, K...
